ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
CONTENT: Hi, I'm Matheusâ€”a software developer passionate about technology, programming, and economics, particularly the Austrian School of Economics.
Based in Brazil, I specialize in building efficient and reliable software solutions using technologies like .NET, C#, Angular, and AWS.
Beyond coding, I enjoy discussing culture, economics, and the future of technology. I'm also an avid language learner, always eager to explore new languages and cultures.

BACKGROUND.TITLE: Background
CONTENT: My journey in software development is driven by a constant desire to learn and innovate.
I've worked on various projects that challenged me to grow both technically and professionally.
My interest in economics provides a unique perspective that enriches my approach to problem-solving and system architecture.

PERSONAL.TITLE: Personal Interests

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Me
CONTACT.CONTENT: Feel free to reach out if you'd like to discuss programming, economics, or share insights on technology and language learning.
